languages.text: "Он совершил преступление... Но я не вижу на его челе печати греха. Это была не ересь, а нечто иное..."
"He committed a crime... though I do not see the brand of judgement on his brow. It was not heresy, but something different..."
languages.original_text: "Он совершил преступление... Но я не вижу на его челе печати греха. Это была не ересь, а нечто иное..."

traits.locale_text: "He committed a crime... But I do not see the seal of sin on his brow. It was not heresy; it was something different..."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "He committed a crime... But I do not see the seal of sin on his brow. It was not heresy; it was something different..."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "He committed a crime... But I do not see the seal of transgression on his brow. It was not heresy; it was something different..."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "He committed a crime... But I do not see the seal of transgression on his brow. It was not heresy; it was something different..."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "He committed a crime... though I do not see the brand of judgement on his brow. It was not heresy, but something different..."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "He committed a crime... though I do not see the brand of judgement on his brow. It was not heresy, but something different..."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: “他确实犯了罪……但我并没有在他的眉心看到任何需要审判的印记。这并不是异端邪说，而是某种别的东西……”
languages.original_text: "He committed a crime... though I do not see the brand of judgement on his brow. It was not heresy, but something different..."

traits.locale_text: “他确实犯了罪……但我并没有在他的眉心看到任何犯罪的印记。这并不是异端邪说，而是某种别的东西……”
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: 「奴は罪を犯した…だが、眉に裁きの烙印は見当たらない。きっと、異端ではなく、何か違う罪だったのだろう…」
languages.original_text: "He committed a crime... though I do not see the brand of judgement on his brow. It was not heresy, but something different..."

traits.locale_text: 「奴は罪を犯した…だが、眉に裁きの烙印は見当たらない。きっと、異端ではなく、何か違う罪だったのだろう…」
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: «Cometió un crimen... pero no veo la marca del juicio en su frente. No fue herejía, fue algo distinto...».
languages.original_text: "He committed a crime... though I do not see the brand of judgement on his brow. It was not heresy, but something different..."

traits.locale_text: «Cometió un crimen... pero no veo el sello de transgresión en su frente. No fue herejía, fue algo distinto...».
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Er hat ein Verbrechen begangen ... Doch ich sehe auf seiner Stirn nicht das Brandmal des Urteils. Es war keine Ketzerei. Es war etwas anderes ..."
languages.original_text: "He committed a crime... though I do not see the brand of judgement on his brow. It was not heresy, but something different..."

traits.locale_text: "Er hat ein Verbrechen begangen ... Doch ich sehe auf seiner Stirn nicht das Siegel der Sünde. Es war keine Ketzerei. Es war etwas anderes ..."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: « Il a commis un crime... mais je ne vois pas la marque de la transgression sur son front. Ce n'était pas de l'hérésie, c'était autre chose... »
languages.original_text: "He committed a crime... though I do not see the brand of judgement on his brow. It was not heresy, but something different..."

traits.locale_text: « Il a commis un crime... mais je ne vois pas la marque de la transgression sur son front. Ce n'était pas de l'hérésie, c'était autre chose... »
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Suç işledi ancak... Kaşlarının üzerinde adalet damgasını göremiyorum. Yaptığı kâfirlik değildi, başka bir şeydi."
languages.original_text: "He committed a crime... though I do not see the brand of judgement on his brow. It was not heresy, but something different..."

traits.locale_text: "Bir suç işledi ancak... Kaşlarının üzerindeki adalet işaretini göremiyorum. Yaptığı kâfirlik değildi, başka bir şeydi."
traits.speaker: Chorda
